protein.specific_function: Modulator of adipocyte lipid metabolism. Coats lipid storage droplets to protect them from breakdown by hormone- sensitive lipase (HSL). Its absence may result in leanness

reference.reference_text: Nishiu J, Tanaka T, Nakamura Y: Isolation and chromosomal mapping of the human homolog of perilipin (PLIN), a rat adipose tissue-specific gene, by differential display method. Genomics. 1998 Mar 1;48(2):254-7.
